price: Та-син. Ово су речи Кур'ана и јасне Књиге,[1]
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: [1] Види фусноту првог стиха у поглављу "Крава".

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
